attributes.additional_details:
With reference rioters following should be punishment/rehabilitation.
1. Evict most serious cases of rioters from housing only.
2 Department of work and pensions to look at those claiming disability benefits involved and stop them claiming.
3 All rioters lengthy community service if not attend stop benefits.
4 Children involved schools and other childrens agencies and housing to rehabilatate.
5 Consider national service for future riots as deterrent.
